message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1000000. We are looking forward to discussing this opportunity with you.
I appreciate the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on our product, we would like to propose a price of $950000.
I appreciate the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. After careful consideration, we would like to propose a price of $900000 for our product.
I'm getting closer to a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $825000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. After further negotiations, we would like to propose a price of $875000 for our product.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $800000 is the maximum I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. After considering your proposal, we would like to counter with an offer of $850000 for our product.
This is my final offer, $800000 is the maximum I'm willing to pay.
